citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process from 1:45 to
2:15pm on Monday 7/28/2014. Both doors were knocked on and nobody answered.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process from 1:45 to
2:15pm on Monday 7/28/2014.  Both doors were knocked on and nobody answered.
